title: COURT Is Now In Session
body_text:
Never before have the couples of the famed five-year game separated so dramatically or tragically as
EastCoastDodgeball's
forthcoming attraction. In preparation for "Divorce Court" on October 16, here's a special peek at the power pairs as well as a history lesson of sorts on the dreaded
CREAMation
stipulation - - -
rafferty . dennebaum
Accurately described as the "wild cards" of their respective squads, neither Ryan nor Julia have ever been seated in the captain's chair. To say it will be interesting to see how these two will adjust in their unfamiliar roles would certainly be an understatement. Did "The Writer" mention it's also Julia's birthday? How's that for an extra ingredient!
ryan rafferty
: Debut "Immaculate Redemption" on August 14, 2010
julia dennebaum
: Debut DODGEBALL C70 on December 27, 2008
anniversary
: May 22, 2010
hoppe . edwards
It's the story of "beauty and the beast" as the lovely Ashley puts it all on the line against
ECD's
"craziest" animal, Michael Edwards. And strangely, it was "The Crazy One" who was initially reluctant in accepting the stipulation despite his one-loss captains record! Regardless, this well-known, respected pair of dodgeball greats will indeed split with one unfortunately leaving "blinded by the white."
ashley hoppe
: Debut DODGEBALL 154 on September 6, 2008
michael edwards
: Debut DODGEBALL 47 on July 7, 2006
anniversary
: August 8, 2008
spengeman . mullins
The Spengeman-Mullins duo is the only one of the three created because of
ECD
. Both carry a wealth of big-time match experience and will undoubtedly use such knowledge to gain the upper hand. What becomes of these two top talents once "Divorce Court" is all said and done remains to be seen.
dan spengeman
: Debut DODGEBALL DAY 3 on September 10, 2005
michelle mullins
: Debut DODGEBALL 90 on June 2, 2007
anniversary
: January 31, 2009
________________________________________
_______________________
It's only
ECD's
most popular .. recipe for disaster!
Here's a look back at the
CREAMation Rules
wars of the past!
CREAMation 1
| March 24, 2007
EVENT: DODGEBALL LXXXI (81)
MATCH:
Kevin Adams
and
Valerie Winston
defeated
Lenny Herrera
and
John Tronolone
, 6 - 3.
NOTES: This inaugural encounter featured two pairs of best friends competing - Adams-Herrera and Winston-Tronolone - and was actually agreed upon at Bradley Beach Bowling Lanes several weeks prior. Winston and Tronolone purposely scheduled the match on March 24 because they were departing to
WrestleMania 23
the following weekend and wanted to leave their peers with something special.
VIDEOS:
Click Here (Part 1)
.
Click Here (Part 2)
.
Click Here (Extended Video)
CREAMation 2
| June 9, 2007
EVENT: DODGEBALL 91
MATCH:
Justin Pierce
and
Juan Londono
defeated
Diana DiBuccio
, 4 - 2.
NOTES: Tom Adams was DiBuccio's scheduled co-captain but backed out of the match only hours before the event. Had DiBuccio been successful, she would have delivered pies to both Pierce and Londono. To date, this is still the first and only "handicap" captains contest.
VIDEOS:
Click Here (Part 1)
.
Click Here (Part 2)
CREAMation 3
| September 29, 2007
EVENT: DODGEBALL 105
MATCH:
Chris Adams
defeated
Kevin Fitzpatrick
, 4(1)  - 4.
NOTES: This was the second of three amazing matches between the two icons. It was originally scheduled for DODGEBALL 101, but Fitzpatrick's work schedule conflicted with that particular Saturday night. Because of their intense rivalry, Adams and Fitzpatrick participated in
ECD's
first-ever one-on-one tiebreaker, eventually won by Chris.
VIDEO:
Click Here
CREAMation 4
| December 15, 2007
EVENT: DODGEBALL 116
MATCH:
Ryan McCrorey
defeated
Sascha Basista
, 8 - 4.
NOTES: The original match-up featured McCrorey and Travis Mills, but Mills was unable to compete due to personal reasons. At the last minute, Basista accepted both the match and stipulation perhaps later regretting his decision.
VIDEO:
Click Here
CREAMation 5
| February 9, 2008
EVENT: DODGEBALL 125
MATCH:
Lauren Stopa
and
Ryan Letsche
defeated
Lauren Winston
and
Grant Cornero
, 4 - 2.
NOTES: Match announcement came by way of the
ECD TextMessaging System
and was booked to further the on-court rivalries of Stopa-Winston and Letsche-Cornero.
VIDEOS:
Click Here (Part 1)
.
Click Here (Part 2)
CREAMation 6
| March 22, 2008
EVENT: DODGEBALL 131
MATCH:
John Tronolone
defeated
Valerie Winston
, 6 - 4.
NOTES: Like the previous year, these two
WrestleMania
-bound combatants fought to provide one last laugh before their annual trip. The originally planned contest however featured all of the
WrestleMania XXIV
attendees: Travis Mills and Kristen Driscoll against Sascha Basista, Winston, and Tronolone.
VIDEO:
Click Here
CREAMation 7
| May 24, 2008
EVENT: DODGEBALL CXXX9 (139)
MATCH:
Ryan Letsche
defeated
Bobby Vetrano
, 3 - 2.
NOTES: This "cousins contest" served as the prelude for the following week's
Family Affair I
.
VIDEO:
Click Here
CREAMation 8
| September 27, 2008
EVENT: DODGEBALL 157
MATCH:
Alison Bertsch
defeated
Pamela D'Luhy
, 2 - 1.
NOTES: This female-only confrontation was planned a good 3 months in advance, with both Bertsch and D'Luhy actually requesting the match itself. It was purposely put on John Tronolone's birthday to add even more hype to the already anticipated event.
VIDEO:
Click Here
CREAMation 9
| November 22, 2008
EVENT: DODGEBALL CLX5 (165)
MATCH:
John Tronolone
defeated
Ryan Letsche
, 3(1) - 3.
NOTES: The
CREAMation
stipulation was only for the then-undefeated Letsche while Tronolone's captaincy was on the line (
White Flag
stipulation). Like the Adams-Fitzpatrick clash, this too, ended in a single-man tiebreaker.
VIDEO:
Click Here
CREAMation 10
| October 16, 2010
EVENT: DIVORCE COURT
MATCH:
Ryan Rafferty
,
Ashley Hoppe
, and
Dan Spengeman
vs.
Julia Dennebaum
,
Michael Edwards
, and
Michelle Mullins
.

Never before have the couples of the famed five-year game separated so dramatically or tragically as EastCoastDodgeball's forthcoming attraction. In preparation for "Divorce Court" on October 16, here's a special peek at the power pairs as well as a history lesson of sorts on the dreaded CREAMation stipulation - - -


rafferty . dennebaum
Accurately described as the "wild cards" of their respective squads, neither Ryan nor Julia have ever been seated in the captain's chair. To say it will be interesting to see how these two will adjust in their unfamiliar roles would certainly be an understatement. Did "The Writer" mention it's also Julia's birthday? How's that for an extra ingredient!
ryan rafferty: Debut "Immaculate Redemption" on August 14, 2010
julia dennebaum: Debut DODGEBALL C70 on December 27, 2008
anniversary: May 22, 2010

hoppe . edwards
It's the story of "beauty and the beast" as the lovely Ashley puts it all on the line against ECD's "craziest" animal, Michael Edwards. And strangely, it was "The Crazy One" who was initially reluctant in accepting the stipulation despite his one-loss captains record! Regardless, this well-known, respected pair of dodgeball greats will indeed split with one unfortunately leaving "blinded by the white."
ashley hoppe: Debut DODGEBALL 154 on September 6, 2008
michael edwards: Debut DODGEBALL 47 on July 7, 2006
anniversary: August 8, 2008

spengeman . mullins
The Spengeman-Mullins duo is the only one of the three created because of ECD. Both carry a wealth of big-time match experience and will undoubtedly use such knowledge to gain the upper hand. What becomes of these two top talents once "Divorce Court" is all said and done remains to be seen.
dan spengeman: Debut DODGEBALL DAY 3 on September 10, 2005
michelle mullins: Debut DODGEBALL 90 on June 2, 2007
anniversary: January 31, 2009

It's only ECD's most popular .. recipe for disaster!
Here's a look back at the CREAMation Rules wars of the past!

  • CREAMation 1 | March 24, 2007
    EVENT: DODGEBALL LXXXI (81)
    MATCH: Kevin Adams and Valerie Winston defeated Lenny Herrera and John Tronolone, 6 - 3.
    NOTES: This inaugural encounter featured two pairs of best friends competing - Adams-Herrera and Winston-Tronolone - and was actually agreed upon at Bradley Beach Bowling Lanes several weeks prior. Winston and Tronolone purposely scheduled the match on March 24 because they were departing to WrestleMania 23 the following weekend and wanted to leave their peers with something special.
    VIDEOS: Click Here (Part 1) . Click Here (Part 2) . Click Here (Extended Video)

  • CREAMation 2 | June 9, 2007
    EVENT: DODGEBALL 91
    MATCH: Justin Pierce and Juan Londono defeated Diana DiBuccio, 4 - 2.
    NOTES: Tom Adams was DiBuccio's scheduled co-captain but backed out of the match only hours before the event. Had DiBuccio been successful, she would have delivered pies to both Pierce and Londono. To date, this is still the first and only "handicap" captains contest.

  • CREAMation 3 | September 29, 2007
    EVENT: DODGEBALL 105
    MATCH: Chris Adams defeated Kevin Fitzpatrick, 4(1) - 4.
    NOTES: This was the second of three amazing matches between the two icons. It was originally scheduled for DODGEBALL 101, but Fitzpatrick's work schedule conflicted with that particular Saturday night. Because of their intense rivalry, Adams and Fitzpatrick participated in ECD's first-ever one-on-one tiebreaker, eventually won by Chris.
    VIDEO: Click Here

  • CREAMation 4 | December 15, 2007
    EVENT: DODGEBALL 116
    MATCH: Ryan McCrorey defeated Sascha Basista, 8 - 4.
    NOTES: The original match-up featured McCrorey and Travis Mills, but Mills was unable to compete due to personal reasons. At the last minute, Basista accepted both the match and stipulation perhaps later regretting his decision.

  • CREAMation 5 | February 9, 2008

    NOTES: Match announcement came by way of the ECD TextMessaging System and was booked to further the on-court rivalries of Stopa-Winston and Letsche-Cornero.

  • CREAMation 6 | March 22, 2008

    MATCH: John Tronolone defeated Valerie Winston, 6 - 4.
    NOTES: Like the previous year, these two WrestleMania-bound combatants fought to provide one last laugh before their annual trip. The originally planned contest however featured all of the WrestleMania XXIV attendees: Travis Mills and Kristen Driscoll against Sascha Basista, Winston, and Tronolone.

  • CREAMation 7 | May 24, 2008
    EVENT: DODGEBALL CXXX9 (139)
    MATCH: Ryan Letsche defeated Bobby Vetrano, 3 - 2.
    NOTES: This "cousins contest" served as the prelude for the following week's Family Affair I.
    VIDEO: Click Here

  • CREAMation 8 | September 27, 2008
    EVENT: DODGEBALL 157
    MATCH: Alison Bertsch defeated Pamela D'Luhy, 2 - 1.
    NOTES: This female-only confrontation was planned a good 3 months in advance, with both Bertsch and D'Luhy actually requesting the match itself. It was purposely put on John Tronolone's birthday to add even more hype to the already anticipated event.
    VIDEO: Click Here

  • CREAMation 9 | November 22, 2008
    EVENT: DODGEBALL CLX5 (165)
    MATCH: John Tronolone defeated Ryan Letsche, 3(1) - 3.
    NOTES: The CREAMation stipulation was only for the then-undefeated Letsche while Tronolone's captaincy was on the line (White Flag stipulation). Like the Adams-Fitzpatrick clash, this too, ended in a single-man tiebreaker.
    VIDEO: Click Here

  • CREAMation 10 | October 16, 2010
    EVENT: DIVORCE COURT
    MATCH: Ryan Rafferty, Ashley Hoppe, and Dan Spengeman vs. Julia Dennebaum, Michael Edwards, and Michelle Mullins.
